_sText:
This is the final version of hosties_citadel

has many features such as:

-gun toss range
-shot for shot
-solitary cell
-siren
-(one use) all cell opener
-rebel path
-arena
-3 one way walls
-4 normal cells

changed items:
-almost each aspect of the map recieved a spiff up with better textures
-i improved getting to the shot for shot range as well as adding floating deagles with full ammo
-i redid the terrorist spawn point to make it seems more distinct between rebelling and staying normal
-i fixed the one way walls to be able to be shot through
-i added in a larger one way wall for searching for weapons
-i redesigned the arena and added pillars to give it more interesting combat
-i added in two m4a1's in the terrorist rebel path
-the solitary cell no longer has a slow killer.


UPDATE: PLEASE TELL ME IF THERE ARE MISSING MATERIALS OR ERROR MODELS!! THE SERVER IM TRYING TO SUBMIT THIS TO SAYS THERE ARE.
also i would appreciate it if you told me about any glitches you see =] thank you

overall i think its a cool map but i must warn you it is slightly small
